title: Integration verification and documentation
description: Create `src/backend/README.md` with setup instructions: 1) Start PostgreSQL: `docker compose up -d`, 2) Install dependencies: `pip install -e '.[dev]'`, 3) Run migrations: `alembic upgrade head`, 4) Seed database: `python -m app.seed.run`, 5) Start server: `uvicorn app.main:app --reload`, 6) Access GraphQL Playground: http://localhost:8000/graphql, 7) Run tests: `python -m pytest`, 8) Run linter: `ruff check .`. Verify all acceptance criteria from spec are met. Test full workflow end-to-end.
acceptance_criteria:
- README.md with complete setup instructions
- All commands documented
- Workflow tested end-to-end:
  - docker compose starts PostgreSQL
  - alembic upgrade head creates all tables
  - python -m app.seed.run populates data
  - uvicorn starts API server
  - /graphql returns GraphQL Playground
  - { health } query returns 'ok'
  - python -m pytest passes
  - ruff check . passes with 0 errors
- All 10 acceptance criteria from spec verified
